programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Lions look for revenge in their traditional Thanksgiving tussle as they host the rival Packers. This is their NFL-leading 23rd matchup on the holiday, with Detroit boasting a 12-9-1 record. Green Bay started the season by defeating Detroit 27-13.

programme.title: Live: NFL Thanksgiving Thursday Football: Pregame
programme.desc: Pregame coverage of NFL Thanksgiving game.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Chiefs visit the Cowboys for a Thanksgiving Day duel. Dallas sports a 34-22-1 all-time Thanksgiving record, with three straight wins on the holiday. Kansas City last featured in the spot on the inaugural Thursday Night Football broadcast in 2006.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a pop star is assaulted in her home, the SVU investigates the public feud between her rapper husband and a competing recording artist; Fin's family ties to a suspect take him off the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for two suspects that were spotted fleeing the scene after a Muslim woman was assaulted inside a synagogue; Benson is dismayed to find that Rob Miller is out on bail.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenager is found dead in the Hudson River, Lt. Benson suspects Rob Miller is behind the mysterious death but can't prove it; despite having only circumstantial evidence, ADA Stone takes the case to court before Miller can destroy more lives.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson works with a young woman to help her remember the details and suspects in her rape; in order to learn a new witness interview technique, Rollins and Fin have to experience it for themselves.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins clashes with the parents of a teenage runaway; the squad comes together for a significant event.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: Braun hits Milwaukee for family, craft beer and a monster appetite for massive meals.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: In Vegas, Braun bets it all on flavor and finds the city's true magic to be an irresistible bite.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU investigates the sexual assault of a 15-year-old boy, but when he won't cooperate, they must find another way to uncover his perpetrator; Rollins reconnects with her ex, and Benson worries she isn't the Wonder Woman she used to be.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU investigates the sexual assault of a 15-year-old boy, but when he won't cooperate, they must find another way to uncover his perpetrator; Rollins reconnects with her ex; Benson worries she isn't the Wonder Woman she used to be.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl taken from her mother at the U.S.-Mexico border ends up in a sex-trafficking ring in New York, and Benson and Stone fight to reunite the girl with her mother; Rollins confesses to her ex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU must unravel the mystery of a sexually assaulted young homeless woman who has a dual personality; when she goes missing after being assaulted, the team is challenged to uncover not only her identity but also her whereabouts.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a waitress at a popular restaurant is sexually assaulted, SVU looks for the culprit at the top of the culinary food chain, but Benson and Stone hit a wall when it's time to prosecute.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The investigation into a drug-related homicide is hampered by the neighborhood's no-snitch culture; Upton is asked about Ruzek's rough altercation with a suspect.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A meth lab bust uncovers a scam in which children adopted from foreign countries are abandoned, then sold online; Atwater struggles with decisions about moving his siblings to a safer environment.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A family is killed, and the team searches for a drug dealer with a likely connection; Voight asks Vice Sgt. Sean McGrady for help.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Halstead goes under cover to stop an ex-military kidnapping crew from killing an innocent child.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When one of Voight's friends is found passed out in his hotel room with a dead Ukranian girl, Intelligence discovers the murder is connected to a sting and Burgess' boyfriend.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The death of Judge Tommy Wells' daughter puts Intelligence on the track of a pill mill spreading into the suburbs of Chicago and the doctor enabling it; Voight discovers who's been leaking information from the 21st.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Halstead puts his career on the line to help solve a case with ties to his new girlfriend; Voight finally discovers the mole in his unit.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Firehouse 51 responds to an unusual call from another firehouse; the addition of a new firefighter (Miranda Rae Mayo) has repercussions; Casey realizes that certain voters have personal agendas for wanting him elected.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A propaganda attack causes Casey to reconsider his run for alderman; when a man is trapped inside a burning car, it seems the fire may have been set intentionally; Trudy's nerdy brother plans Mouch's bachelor party; a kidnapping investigation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide is led to reexamine a case from the past while he investigates the discovery of a baby's body in a chimney; with election day nearing, Casey prepares for another confrontation with Alderman.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A call takes a bad turn when Brett witnesses a murder while aiding a victim who has a leg wound; a restaurant fire has people trapped inside a vault; Mouch gets cold feet about his upcoming wedding.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey attempts to use political influence to remedy a gang retribution incident; Severide helps Holloway in a dangerous undercover investigation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Detective Holloway testifies in court as part of an undercover operation, leaving Severide to watch her young son; a fire at an art gallery with a victim trapped inside leads Cruz to make a rash decision.

programme.title: Ant-Man and The Wasp
programme.desc: Scott Lang is grappling with the consequences of his choices as both a superhero and a father. Approached by Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym, Lang must once again don the Ant-Man suit and fight alongside the Wasp. The urgent mission soon leads to secret revelations from the past as the dynamic duo find themselves in an epic battle against a powerful new enemy.

programme.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
programme.desc: Ant-Man and the Wasp find themselves exploring the Quantum Realm, interacting with strange new creatures and embarking on an adventure that pushes them beyond the limits of what they thought was possible.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When 19-year-old Anton Black dies while being taken into police custody, the community seeks justice; a yearlong "Dateline" investigation looks at the officer at the center of the case and missed warning signs.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The discovery of an Army captain's death in her El Paso, Texas, home shakes her tight-knit military community.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a woman is abducted during her evening shift at a gift shop, her family keeps the case in the public eye for decades, until investigators finally solve the mystery.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: While opening a safety deposit box at a local bank, NCIS Special Agent Kensi Blye is shot after three armed assailants enter and hold everyone in the building hostage.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: Adaptation of the first of J.K. Rowling's popular children's novels about Harry Potter, a boy who learns on his eleventh birthday that he is the orphaned son of two powerful wizards and possesses unique magical powers of his own. He is summoned from his life as an unwanted child to become a student at Hogwarts, an English boarding school for wizards. There, he meets several friends who become his

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The follow-up to "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" finds young wizard Harry Potterand his friends, Ron and Hermione, facing new challenges during their second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as they try to discover a dark force that is terrorizing the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe) third year at Hogwarts starts off badly when he learns deranged killer Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban prison and is bent on murdering the teenage wizard. programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.
